label: Generate Chart with quickchart
name: generateChartQuickchart
description: This flow step will a request to generate a chart with quickchart Endpoint.

inputs.label: Background Color
inputs.name: backgroundColor
inputs.description: Background of the chart canvas. Accepts colors (red, blue, Default: white), and hex values (#ff00ff).

inputs.label: Width
inputs.name: width
inputs.description: Width of the image in pixels. (Default: 500px)

inputs.label: Height
inputs.name: height
inputs.description: Height of the image in pixels. (Default: 500px)

inputs.label: Output Format
inputs.name: formatoutput
inputs.description: Extension of the image to return. (Default: png)
